overview:
Cristina is VP of Merchandising Strategy at Group Commerce. Cristinaâ€™s merchandising background includes business development and strategy at Gilt Groupe and Gilt City. Prior to that, She co-founded Store Adore (a guide to boutique shopping and local discounts). She also has a background in international strategy consulting.

Cristina holds a Bachelors degree from Stanford University and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
